Summary: unknown aura/lights seen in the skies around Huntersville, NC.. stopped vehicle and took photos
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is a continuation of previous report filed last night. I wanted to include the pictures. pictures are not altered. glow, lights, aura in clouds visible with naked eye so it's not lens flare. not sure what this is but never seen anything like it before. i got out of my car to take all these photos. photos taken at different times and locations around Huntersville, NC. photos are tagged. hopefully you can look at them and judge for yourself.
trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Charlotte
There was one other sighting in Charlotte on or around December 23rd 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
